Header: Chairmen appointed for three institutions of the Health Ministry
Content: Chairmen have been appointed for three institutions coming under the purview of the Health Ministry. The new Chairmen have been appointed for three establishments coming under the Ministry of Health, Nutrition and Indigenous Medicine. The appointments have been made by Minister Rajitha Senaratne. Dr. H.M.M. Rumi has been appointed as Chairman of the State Pharmaceuticals Corporation. Former Director of the Maharagama Apeksha Hospital Dr. Wilfred Kumarasiri has been appointed as the new Managing Director of the Corporation. Prof. Asitha de Silva is the Chairman of the National Drugs Regulatory Authority. Dr. Palitha Abeykoon has been appointed as the Chairman of the National Authority on Tobacco and Alcohol, while the Director General of the Project Supervision Division of the Health Ministry is Dr. Kumara de Silva.
